headline: The GOP might retake Congress in the midterms. Then what?
author: Grayson Quay
sentences: Sure, a right-wing CTC expansion will be designed to incentivize marriage and stay-at-home parenting, and it certainly won't include free pre-K, but a few blue lawmakers  especially some, like Manchin, in otherwise red states  may nevertheless defect for the sake of the kids.
